name: VIXOZ
description:
CAPTURE THE CRYSTAL, DESTROY THE ENEMY

VIXOZ is a tactical split-screen shooter in capture-the-flag style. You and your opponent manufacture a precious crystal called VIXOZ. The goal is simple: destroy enemy's factories and steal the crystal while avoiding gunfire and defending your area.

THE GEAR AND STRATEGY ARE THE KEY

Use the gear to trap your opponent. Choose among three types of vehicles and grab your equipment. Open the radar and plan the route. Frontal attack with tanks or defence with towers and tactical jeep? The choice is yours.
